title: Marcy Kaptur - Wikipedia
snippet: Marcia Carolyn Kaptur (/ˈkæptər/ KAP-tər; born June 17, 1946) is an American politician serving as the U.S. representative for Ohio's 9th congressional district since 1983. A member of the Democratic Party, Kaptur is the longest-serving woman in congressional history and the dean of Ohio's ...

title: About Marcy | Congresswoman Marcy Kaptur
snippet: Congresswoman Kaptur has always shown strong interest in America's standing in the world and its relations with other countries. ... She currently serves on the Congressional-Executive Commission on China and co-chairs the Congressional Hungarian Caucus and also the Ukraine Caucus.

title: Marcy Kaptur - Ballotpedia
snippet: Marcy Kaptur (Democratic Party) is a member of the U.S. House, representing Ohio's 9th Congressional District. She assumed office on January 3, 1983. Her current term ends on January 3, 2027.

title: Marcy Kaptur | Congress.gov | Library of Congress
snippet: BILL 1. H.R.6198 — 119th Congress (2025-2026) Rear Admiral Alene Duerk Ship Renaming Act of 2025 Sponsor: Kaptur, Marcy [Rep.-D-OH-9] (Introduced 11/20/2025) Cosponsors: (3) Committees: House - Armed Services Latest Action: House - 11/20/2025 Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

title: Congresswoman Marcy Kaptur |Representing the 9th District of Ohio
snippet: Toledo, OH – Today, Congresswoman Marcy Kaptur (OH-09) received confirmation from the US Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) that funding for Toledo Public Schools Head Start Program has been certified and will resume immediately.
